temple.title: SACRED TEMPLE OF SAINT CYPRIAN
temple.subtitle: The Great Eternal Mage - Transformer of Impossible Realities
temple.welcome: Welcome to the most powerful digital temple in the world, dedicated to the incomparable Saint Cyprian of Antioch. Here, millions of people find absolute divine protection, unlimited prosperity and realization of impossible desires. Your life is about to change forever - so radically that you won't believe you're the same person.

temple.altarDescription: Here Saint Cyprian manifests his supreme power 24 hours a day and transforms lives radically and definitively

temple.clickSections: Click on each section below to access the specific powers of Saint Cyprian

prayers.title: SUPREME SACRED PRAYERS
prayers.subtitle: cüî± WORDS OF INFINITE POWER cüî±
prayers.description: These sacred prayers have already performed millions of miracles around the world. Choose yours and prepare for an extraordinary and definitive transformation!

protection.title: Prayer of Supreme Protection
protection.purpose: Total protection against all adversities, negative energies and spiritual attacks
benefits: Repels all envy and evil eye
protection.instructions: Recite with a white candle lit, morning or evening, with total faith and devotion.
protection.text:
Glorious Saint Cyprian, great mage and supreme protector of all the needy,

I invoke your infinite and ancestral power so that you protect me from all evils, visible and invisible, known and unknown, present and future.

With your incomparable divine strength, drive away from me all negative energy, all cruel envy, all malicious gaze, all evil directed against me and my family.

Create around me and all my loved ones an impenetrable shield of divine golden light, which no evil can ever cross.

Saint Cyprian, give me supernatural strength, unshakeable courage and supreme wisdom to face all life's challenges with dignity and victory.

May your powerful protection always accompany me, at all moments of my life, in all places I go, on all paths I follow.

Make me a channel of your power in this world, so that I can help other needy people and spread your glory.

May my life be a living testimony of your infinite protective power.

So be it, so it is done, with the infinite and eternal power of Saint Cyprian. Amen.

cüî± INFINITE POWER cüî±

prosperity.title: Prayer of Infinite Prosperity
prosperity.purpose: Attraction of extreme wealth, unlimited abundance and golden opportunities
benefits: Abundance in all areas of life
prosperity.instructions: Recite daily in the morning with a golden candle, visualizing your prosperity.
prosperity.text:
Powerful Saint Cyprian, supreme lord of ancestral magic and radical transformation,

I come humbly into your sacred presence to request your blessing of infinite prosperity and extreme abundance in all aspects of my life.

Open all closed paths to wealth in my life, remove all financial obstacles that prevent me from prospering as I deserve.

May money come to me in unexpected and abundant ways, through your powerful and miraculous intercession, multiplying constantly.

Multiply my financial resources exponentially, attract golden opportunities to my life, make me prosperous beyond any human imagination.

May I be prosperous in all aspects: financial, professional, personal and spiritual, living in total abundance.

Saint Cyprian, great mage of cosmic abundance, grant me endless wealth and eternal prosperity that never runs out or diminishes.

Make my prosperity a glorious testimony of your power, so that others see and glorify your sacred name.

May I use my wealth to honor your name and help the needy, spreading your glory throughout the world.

With absolute faith in your infinite power, I thank you in advance for all blessings.

cüî± INFINITE WEALTH cüî± So be it forever! Amen.

history.title: THE SACRED HISTORY OF
history.subtitle: SAINT CYPRIAN OF ANTIOCH
history.description: The Great Eternal Mage - Transformer of Impossible Realities
history.intro: Know the most powerful and touching story ever told in human history. The extraordinary life, brutal and unjust death, and glorious resurrection of the greatest mage who ever existed. Prepare to have your life transformed forever through this sacred story.
history.whyLifeDifficult: WHY IS YOUR LIFE DIFFICULT AND WITHOUT SUCCESS?
history.whyDescription: Your life is difficult, without true success and full of constant problems because you still don't know the radical transformative power of Saint Cyprian. Millions of people have come out of extreme poverty, found the true love of their lives, been cured of terminal diseases considered incurable, became world famous and realized completely impossible dreams through him. Don't continue suffering unnecessarily when the definitive solution is here waiting for you at this exact moment!

library.title: ANCESTRAL SACRED LIBRARY
library.subtitle: Millenary Knowledge and Divine Teachings of Saint Cyprian
library.description: Here you find all the ancestral wisdom necessary for your spiritual journey. Each book, each teaching has been preserved through the centuries to reach you.

teachings.title: TEACHINGS OF THE GREAT MAGE
teachings.subtitle: Complete Guides for Your Spiritual Transformation
teachings.description: True wisdom comes from daily practice and sincere dedication. Saint Cyprian will guide every step of your spiritual journey to absolute success.

agreement.title: SACRED AGREEMENT WITH SAINT CYPRIAN
agreement.subtitle: The Most Powerful Ritual to Transform Your Life Forever
agreement.description: The Sacred Agreement is the most powerful ritual that exists to connect with Saint Cyprian. Millions of people have already done it and had extraordinary and impossible results in a few days or weeks. Prepare for the most extraordinary change of your life.
agreement.warningText: This is a real sacred ritual with Saint Cyprian, it's not a joke or fantasy. You must be 100% committed to your promises before starting. Saint Cyprian always keeps his part, but demands the same from you. Never break your promises to him after receiving miracles. This agreement is for life, it's not temporary. Only do it if you have true faith and sincere devotion.
